data.name: Aground Zero
data.detailed_description:
Aground Zero is a 3D spinoff of Aground - taking place during the same timeline of the main game. As one of the few survivors deep underground on Earth, you will have to mine, craft and build a bunker with only your protosuit and a cheerful AI as a companion.

Did other humans survive the bombardment? Perhaps together you can make someplace livable, and even try to return to the surface - but who knows what you'll find when you get there!

What can you do in Aground Zero?

  • Mine ores, gems, and other resources
  • Build structures
  • Rescue survivors
  • Fight enemies and bosses
  • Explore the ruins of Earth
  • Upgrade your tools and Protosuit
  • Craft items and automate factories
  • Balance power generation and usage
  • Meet some familiar faces in 3D
  • Reach the surface, and beyond?
data.about_the_game:
Aground Zero is a 3D spinoff of Aground - taking place during the same timeline of the main game. As one of the few survivors deep underground on Earth, you will have to mine, craft and build a bunker with only your protosuit and a cheerful AI as a companion.

Did other humans survive the bombardment? Perhaps together you can make someplace livable, and even try to return to the surface - but who knows what you'll find when you get there!

What can you do in Aground Zero?

  • Mine ores, gems, and other resources

  • Rescue survivors
  • Fight enemies and bosses

data.short_description: The world has ended. You are deep underground, and all alone other than your AI companion. You will have to mine and build to survive, and search for other survivors to help you. Will you be able to reach the surface? And what will you see when you get there?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
